overview: Remy (Shaheizy Sam) worked as a paramedic who was a quiet, shy with girls, and constantly bullied by his peers. At the same time, like many other young men, he was also a shortage of funds. In short: Remy a loser. Until today Remy saved the life of a triad leader named Megat. In return, Megat offers the opportunity to join the group Remy, but Remy rejects. But when threatened, Remy finally had to obey. In the past she Remy a loser now re-emerged as a gangster ... thus plunged into a dark world, with no way out ...
title: Kisah Paling Gangster
